description: This file defines interfaces related to warning reporting within the WPEFramework, including warning events, reporting units, and controls for warning categories.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Interface for controlling warning reporting categories, allowing exclusion, configuration, and cloning of warning category controls.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Category
methods.description: Returns the category of the warning event.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Serialize
methods.description: Serializes the warning event into a byte buffer.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Deserialize
methods.description: Deserializes the warning event from a byte buffer.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::ToString
methods.description: Converts the warning event into a human-readable string.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::IsWarning
methods.description: Indicates if the event is a warning.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event with a specific identifier.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a warning category, including default status, enabled status, excluded list, and configuration.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a category control to the category list.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a category control from the category list.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl::Configure
methods.description: Configures settings for a warning category.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl::Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the warning reporting control.
